contentrichtext.text: '''Kawachi''' may refer to: ==People== * [[Kawachi (surname)]] ==Places== * [[Kawachi Province]], one of the old provinces of Japan * [[Kawachi, Kumamoto]], a former town in Kumamoto Prefecture * [[Kawachi, Osaka]], a former city in Osaka Prefecture * [[Kawachi, Ibaraki]], a town in Ibaraki Prefecture * [[Kawachi, Ishikawa]], a former village in Ishikawa Prefecture * [[Kawachi, Tochigi]], a former town in Tochigi Prefecture ==Other uses== * [[Kawachi ondo]], a genre of Japanese music * [[Kawachi class battleship]] ==See also== * [[Cahuachi]], major ceremonial center of the Nazca culture in present-day Peru {{disambiguation|geo}}
